product_name: Soleus GPS 1.0 Fitness Trainer Sport Watch - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and compact, the Soleus GPS 1.0 Fitness Trainer sport watch has everything you need to easily and accurately track your speed and distance, all in an easy-to-wear wrist-top unit. High-sensitivity GPS receiver helps you navigate and track your distances while you run, walk or hike. Personalize your Soleus GPS 1.0 by inputting your data to track calories burned during exercise routines. Features auto lap splits at every mile, current and total distance in miles or kilometers, and current and average pace/speed. The Soleus GPS 1.0 Fitness Trainer sport watch also includes a 1/100 second chronograph, 100-lap memory, world time for 106 cities and a USB-rechargeable battery. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and compact, the Soleus GPS 1.0 Fitness Trainer sport watch has everything you need to easily and accurately track your speed and distance, all in an easy-to-wear wrist-top unit.
